messages.title: WE CAN’T GO ON LIKE THIS. IT’S TIME FOR CHANGE.
messages.content: The general election is just weeks away now. This is a big moment for Britain. It comes at a time when our economy is in deep trouble, we need to mend our broken society and rebuild trust in our political system. We can’t go on like this. Britain needs change to get the country back on its feet – to heal the mistakes of the past and bring new ideas and energy for our future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will cut the deficit. As every family knows, the longer you leave a debt problem, the worse it gets.
We will act to restore responsibility to our society and we will cut the cost of politics and bring transparency to Parliament.
We will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.
We will stand up for families, sort out our schools and fight back against crime.

issues.economy: We will cut the deficit. As every family knows, the longer you leave a debt problem, the worse it gets.
issues.education: We will stand up for families, sort out our schools and fight back against crime.
issues.governance: We will act to restore responsibility to our society and we will cut the cost of politics and bring transparency to Parliament.
issues.health: We will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.

quotes.text: When you're standing in that polling booth with the pencil in your hand, I want you to remember this: your vote will help decide the kind of country Britain can be in the decades ahead. Vote for a positive future. Vote Conservative. Voting for anyone else will help Gordon Brown cling on to power. So please – for the sake of our great country – don't miss your chance to vote for change.

images.caption: David Cameron in a confident pose with a message prompting change.
